entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
